description: InferICD10CM detects medical conditions as entities listed in a patient record and links those entities to normalized concept identifiers in the ICD-10-CM knowledge base from the Centers for Disease Control. Amazon Comprehend Medical only detects medical entities in English language texts.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: The input text used for analysis.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: The medical conditions detected in the text linked to ICD-10-CM concepts. If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200 response, as well as the entities detected.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for the entity. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text that is matched to the detected entity.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the entity. InferICD10CM detects entities in the MEDICAL_CONDITION category.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Describes the specific type of entity with category of entities. InferICD10CM detects entities of the type DX_NAME and TIME_EXPRESSION.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detection.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The detected attributes that relate to the entity. An extracted segment of the text that is an attribute of an entity, or otherwise related to an entity, such as the nature of a medical condition.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute. InferICD10CM detects entities of the type DX_NAME.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as an attribute.

nested_items.name: RelationshipScore
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that this attribute is correctly related to this entity.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for this attribute. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text which contains the detected attribute.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: The contextual information for the attribute. The traits recognized by InferICD10CM are DIAGNOSIS, SIGN, SYMPTOM, and NEGATION.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as a trait.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of attribute. Can be either of DX_NAME or TIME_EXPRESSION.

nested_items.name: RelationshipType
nested_items.description: The type of relationship between the entity and attribute. Type for the relationship can be either of OVERLAP or SYSTEM_ORGAN_SITE.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Provides Contextual information for the entity. The traits recognized by InferICD10CM are DIAGNOSIS, SIGN, SYMPTOM, and NEGATION.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as a trait.

nested_items.name: ICD10CMConcepts
nested_items.description: The ICD-10-CM concepts that the entity could refer to, along with a score indicating the likelihood of the match.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The long description of the ICD-10-CM code in the ontology.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The ICD-10-CM code that identifies the concept found in the knowledge base from the Centers for Disease Control.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the entity is accurately linked to an ICD-10-CM concept.

nested_items.name: PaginationToken
nested_items.description: If the result of the previous request to InferICD10CM was truncated, include the PaginationToken to fetch the next page of medical condition entities.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model used to analyze the documents, in the format n.*n*.*n* You can use this information to track the model used for a particular batch of documents.
